data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime on Android 7.0 Nougat
data.actual_result: A invisible(grey) badge appears besides your profile picture in the list
data.expected_result: You see yourself as if you were any other offline member in the list
data.short_description: You can see a badge in the mention menu after going invisible
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your status to invisible - Go to a server - Type @ followed by your name to get the mention menu to come up - Observe yourself in the list
